item.title: Illegal Start Of Expression - Help!
item.dc:creator: @F00L_I_K0 F00L I K0
item.description:
@F00L_I_K0 wrote:

I’ve noticed that by now.
Try this though:( I took it straight out of Satans Isle.)

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if (amount > 0) { if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){ if (!takeAsNote) { if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) { if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) { if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) { bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount; resetBank(); resetItems(5064); }

I had the same problem with my server. The reason was I put a } in the wrong place :S

Read full topic

item.title: Illegal Start Of Expression - Help!
item.dc:creator: @F00L_I_K0 F00L I K0
item.description:
@F00L_I_K0 wrote:

Try this:

}	public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
		if (amount > 0) {
			if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
				if (!takeAsNote) {
					if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
						if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
							if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
								bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
								resetBank();
								resetItems(5064);
							}
						} else {
							if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot])) {
								bankItems[fromSlot] = 0;
								bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;
								resetBank();
								resetItems(5064);
							}
						}

Btw, it’s I siscilla I
Also the [] is 1 Tab

Read full topic

item.title: Illegal Start Of Expression - Help!
item.dc:creator: @Byty Byty
item.description:
@Byty wrote:

[CODE] try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/kicklogs.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" kicked "+PlayerHandler.kickNick);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error logging kicks!”);
}
}

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./logs/kicklogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" kicked "+PlayerHandler.kickNick);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
 }
  }
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::kick [PLAYERNAME]");
			}
		} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall")) {
			PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
		}
	} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
                    if(muted == 1)
                    sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
                    else
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
	}
}
			
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {[/CODE]

Hope it helps.

item.title: Illegal Start Of Expression - Help!
item.dc:creator: @Liam1 Liam-
item.description:
@Liam1 wrote:

like i said, this isn’t going to be easy.

you have to start from frombank and scroll up slowly, checking all commands for bracket errors, everytime you see
}
}

or
}
}
}
or
none at all, take away, or add one or two, and save, don’t exit, compile, if there are new errors, put it back as it was, do this until its fixed.

-Liam

item.title: Illegal Start Of Expression - Help!
item.dc:creator: @Liam1 Liam-
item.description:
@Liam1 wrote:

you have to many }'s or {'s or don’t have enough }'s or {'s

it happends some times when you incorrectly add a command into your client.java

just scroll up until you find the problem
you’ll probably see
}
}

or some thing.

just erase one, save, don’t exit, compile, if a new error comes up, put it back, and continue, until you find the problem.

-Liam

Read full topic
